channel.title: redjade_hu tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from redjade_hu.

item.description:
@Lowkey0nline Kareem, understand this clearly: Ukraine is under invasion, occupation and suffering under ongoing cultural genocide by the Russians.

Ukraine did not invade Russia.

This occupation is illegal under international law, just like Israel's occupation of Palestine is illegal.
@davewiner never will happen because the precedent would be too dangerous to the 1% and their representatives in government.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner never will happen because the precedent would be too dangerous to the 1% and their representatives in government.

Trump always lies.
read the thread https://t.co/Cm2ZRa9B8x

item.description: @HelloAndrew @daveberkeleyuk @doctorsoumya if they deleted it, then you would say it is a cover up – either way they will be attacked. At least this is honest, somehow.
item.source:markdown: @HelloAndrew @daveberkeleyuk @doctorsoumya if they deleted it, then you would say it is a cover up – either way they will be attacked. At least this is honest, somehow.
